sfa.fileio module¶

sfa.fileio.read_inputs(fpath)[source]¶
sfa.fileio.read_sif(fpath, signs={'+': 1, '-': -1}, sort=True, as_nx=False)[source]¶
sfa.fileio.create_from_sif(fpath, abbr=None, inputs=None, outputs=None)[source]¶

Create sfv.base.Data object from SIF file.

Parameters:
fpath : str

Absolute path of SIF file

abbr : str

Abbreviation to denote this data object for the network.

inputs : dict, optional

Input information with default values

outputs : sequence, optional

Output information.
Returns:
obj : sfv.base.Data

Data object with the information of network topology.
